meanings.sent1: The mutest person in the room communicated through gestures.
meanings.sent2: The shyest child in the class was also the mutest.
meanings.sent3: At the library, the librarian joked that the mutest book was the one with no words at all.
meanings.sent4: In the silent forest, the trees stood like mutest sentinels guarding the secrets of nature.
meanings.sent5: The mutest snowfall blanketed the town in a peaceful hush.

meanings.sent1: The mutest room in the house was the soundproof studio.
meanings.sent2: The mutest animal in the zoo was the sleeping sloth.
meanings.sent3: The mutest alarm clock failed to wake up the heavy sleeper.
meanings.sent4: The mutest night was broken only by the distant howl of a lone wolf.
meanings.sent5: The mutest desert landscape stretched endlessly under the blazing sun.

meanings.definition: Showing restraint or lack of enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: She gave a mutest response to the disappointing news.
meanings.sent2: The mutest applause followed the uninspiring performance.
meanings.sent3: The mutest party guest sat quietly in the corner observing the festivities.
meanings.sent4: His mutest smile barely concealed his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The mutest protest was a simple refusal to participate.
